column4: Server requested plaintext password but 'client plaintext auth' is disabled  tree connect failed: SUCCESS - 0. How can I enable "client plaintext auth"?
yes I added this line "client plaintext auth = yes"
and is that what the line should look like ?
great! I've added the line "client lanman auth = yes", now i'm gonna try
let me know how you go
nothing it doesn't work, same error
try adding this to smb.conf global : client ntlmv2 auth = no
it doesn't work. But when samba asks the root pwd I have to write the one of the root user? Haven't I?
im not sure what you are asking
sorry, you might want to see what you can do about making the server use something more secure
is it possible to reset the smb.conf file to default?
